import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import ReactApexChart from"react-apexcharts";import Card from'@mui/material/Card';import CardContent from'@mui/material/CardContent';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BubbleChart=_ref=>{let{products}=_ref;// Use state to manage the chart data
